title: Breaking the habit
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cancer - Prevention

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cigarette habit
description: With the theme: "the self-delusion of the cigarette smoker", records a conversation between two cartoon characters, George, the "quitting" smoker, and his friend. Concludes on a serious but hopeful note, pointing out that the chances of developing serious diseases decrease the moment you stop smoking.
